data.text: @johnsgunn @signindoc @PhotonicPunk @nthlstrgn Denmarks cases have been dropping steady it took the 2 weeks that public health states it takes to notice a change in mandates.
@signindoc @PhotonicPunk @nthlstrgn And that would track with what we're seeing out of Denmark right now...
@signindoc @PhotonicPunk @nthlstrgn I think reinstating any kind of restrictions will be difficult but they will need to be. No mask and no isolation requirements are a huge mistake
@PhotonicPunk @nthlstrgn Was expected from the projections, but I suspect by mid-March BA-2 will be spiking.
@PhotonicPunk @nthlstrgn They seemed pretty confident last week that dropping all restrictions wouldn't result in unmanageable hospitalizations.  Personally, I'm extremely skeptical.
@nthlstrgn How can we find out how many are BA.2?
@PhotonicPunk @nthlstrgn That's 17 net. 34 new before recoveries and deaths.
@nthlstrgn Very much looks like we are plateauing and the next wave is about to begin. 17 new hospitalizations?
